Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2013 05:12PM termi678 wrote: Hi Meima-Bev Hope you are doing fine.  Recently, my wife was diagnosed with metastatic brachial plexus and currently she is waiting to have a biopsy.  She first had breast cancer in 1991 and as a result had a mastectomy.  The cancer came back about five years ago and was treaty properly.  She underwent chemoterapy with Femara and Zometa to strengthen her bones.  The last MRI indicated that metastatic brachial plexus was present.  She is in constant pain and we are currently trying to deal with this.  Any info that you can share with us will be greatly appreciated.  Hope you are doing fine.  God bless. Termi678
Posts.Title: metastatic bc to brachial plexus w/ bone mets meima-Bev melnie
